### Tender Notice for Handcart, 2-Bottle, O2, Service & Purge Cart

#### Reference and Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-618-53462535
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-248024/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-08
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-24T14:00:00

#### Tender Overview

This notice invites bidders to submit their proposals for the procurement of Handcart, 2-Bottle, O2, Service & Purge Cart. The requirement is for 8 units to be delivered to 25 Canadian Forces Supplemental Depot (CFSD) Montreal and 7 units to be delivered to 7 Canadian Forces Supplemental Depot (CFSD) Edmonton by March 2024.

#### Supplier Requirements

Bidders who propose an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, Part Number, and the National Codification Bureau (NCAGE) assigned.

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement

Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service instead of any other method of delivery. This will help to ensure timely and efficient receipt of their proposals.

#### Procurement Details

The procurement is a Competitive Open Tender, and the selection criteria are as follows:

* Lowest Price

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Contracting Entity and Contact Information

* Contracting Entity Name: Director General Aerospace and Electronic Procurement Management (DGAEPM)
* Contact Person: Dany Lebel
* Contact Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (000) 000-0000

## Tender Documentation

For more information and to view the tender documentation, please visit the Canada Buys website at [link to attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27147/w8485-248024.a---rfp-canada-buys-%28en.pdf). Tenderers can also download the electronic version of this notice from the Canada Buys website.
